description: Activity recognition with multiple body-worn smartphones. 10 subjects performing 7 physical activities. Sensors at 5 body positions (left_pocket, right_pocket, wrist, upper_arm, belt) with accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer at 50 Hz.

channels.name: left_pocket_acc_x
channels.description: Accelerometer X-axis from left trouser pocket smartphone sensor
